title: I’m Just an Underling of an Evil Organization, but for Some Reason I was Ordered to Honeytrap the Hero - Novel Updates
tags: Amnesia   Androids   Apocalypse   Carefree Protagonist   Dark   Doting Love Interests   Dystopia   Evil Organizations   First-time Interc**rse   Heroes   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Low-key Protagonist   Monsters   Mpreg   Obsessive Love   Past Plays a Big Role   R*pe Victim Becomes Lover   R*pe   Seduction   Strong Love Interests   Unreliable Narrator
author: Buppoosoo   ブッポーソー
description:
I’m a combatant for an Evil Organization. I was ordered by the top brass to seduce our enemy, the hero. But I’m just an underling? And it’s absurdly scary to be in contact with the hero!! 

Can the combat android made by an Evil Organization, Hiroto, safely (?) lure in the hero who boasts of overwhelming strength, Akkad? 

At the end of the day, this is a Mad Scientist plot. The world’s actual state is…

Hero of Justice X Evil Organization Underling. I accidentally made this a story about the not-too distant future. The story proper is in the perspective of a carefree bottom, but there will also be the top’s perspective of the serious underlying situation. The top’s perspective may have your heart hurting, depending on the person. 

I just stuffed in everything I like, so I’m sharing it with everyone. Take a look if you’d like.>
